other_title: Andersen Monogatari: Match Uri no Shōjo (Japanese)
Andersen's Stories: The Little Girl With the Matches
El maravilloso mundo del pequeño Andersen (Spanish)
Las Fábulas de Hans Christian Andersen (Spanish)
The World of Hans Christian Andersen
アンデルセン物語 マッチ売りの少女 (Japanese)
plot: While the young and poor kid (H. Anderson) was trying to buy tickets for the opera, he discovered his talent for telling stories and singing. Helping unfortunate kids with his stories. Taking them to a daydream like world. It focuses on two stories The Red Shoes, and The Little Match Girl.
insert_song: "Kimi wa Subarashii Tsubasa wo Motte Iru" (君はすばらしいつばさを持っている) by Tadao Takashima, Toshiko Fujita, Chiharu Kuri
